name: The GRAND BASEMENT ADVENTURES of Peepis Randir
name_original: The GRAND BASEMENT ADVENTURES of Peepis Randir
description:
PEEPIS RANDIR, the famed dice wizard, has been captured! Can he defeat all four bosses and escape his fate?

Tutorial:
Throw dice at enemies to cast spells. Put the matching dice in the boss trays to kill the bosses.

Curse die (purple): When this die stops rolling, any enemy the die hit will take however much damage is on the die.
Flame die (orange): Unleashes an inferno around the die for the number of seconds listed on the die.
Ice die (blue): Freezes enemies that got hit by the die, for the number of seconds listed on the die.
